item.title: Heather add a quote by Alice Sebold
item.description: "Murderers are not monsters, they're men. And that's the most frightening thing about them." -- Alice Sebold

item.title: Heather add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Heather add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "love, I've come to understand is more than three words mumbled before bedtime." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Heather add a quote by Gabrielle Zevin
item.description: "People, you'll find, aren't usually all good or bad. Sometimes they're just a little bit good and a whole lot bad. And sometimes they're mostly good with a dash of bad. And most of us, well, we fall in the middle somewhere." -- Gabrielle Zevin

item.title: Heather add a quote by Judy Blume
item.description: "The truth will make you odd." -- Judy Blume

item.title: Heather add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Heather add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "Everyone looks retarded once you set your mind to it." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Heather add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "Shit is the tofu of cursing and can be molded to whichever condition the speaker desires. Hot as shit. Windy as shit. I myself was confounded as shit..." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Heather add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "So, please, oh please, we beg, we pray, go throw your TV set away, and in its place you can install, a lovely bookcase on the wall." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Heather add a quote by Meg Cabot
item.description: "Wait. Why am I thinking about Krispy Kremes? Weâ€™re supposed to be exercising." -- Meg Cabot

item.title: Heather add a quote by William Langewiesche
item.description: "So much of who we are is where we have been." -- William Langewiesche

item.title: Heather add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Remember to always be yourself. Unless you suck." -- Joss Whedon
